trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref> is not able to complete a <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send*> or <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync*> operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示时，将引发的异常<xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref>无法完成<> *1> 或<> *1> 操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property contains the status code returned by the SMTP server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>属性包含 SMTP 服务器返回的状态代码。</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The exception returned by this constructor has its <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode>.
trans-unit.target: 返回此构造函数的异常具有其<xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode>。</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class with the specified status code.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>类替换为指定的状态代码。

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `statusCode` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数使用`statusCode`参数初始化<xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>属性。</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>与指定的错误消息的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `message` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数使用`message`参数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>描述发生该错误。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class with the specified status code and error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>与指定的状态代码和错误消息的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `statusCode` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property and uses the `message` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数使用`statusCode`参数初始化<xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>属性并使用`message`参数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>描述发生该错误。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class from the specified instances of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> classes.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>类的指定实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>和<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>类。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> class.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数实现<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>接口的<xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>类。</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains the information required to serialize the new <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> ，包含序列化新所需的信息<xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the new instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>，包含的源和目标与新的实例关联的序列化流。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class with the specified error message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和内部异常的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `message` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property and the `innerException` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数使用`message`参数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>属性和`innerException`参数初始化<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `innerException` is not `null`, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles `innerException`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`innerException`不`null`，处理的 catch 块中引发当前异常`innerException`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>描述发生该错误。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance with the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 填充<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>实例序列化所需的数据与<xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Any objects included in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的任何对象<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>会自动跟踪和序列化格式化程序。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>要填充数据。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that specifies the destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>用于指定此序列化的目标。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets the status code returned by an SMTP server when an e-mail message is transmitted.
trans-unit.target: 获取传输电子邮件时返回的 SMTP 服务器的状态代码。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value that indicates the error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"> </xref>值，该值指示发生的错误。

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance with the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 填充<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>实例序列化所需的数据与<xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>, which holds the serialized data for the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>，用于存储的序列化的数据<xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the destination of the serialized stream associated with the new <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>，其中包含与新关联的序列化流的目标<xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref>。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
